title: The Masked Singer Australia's Prawn is revealed
text:
The identity of the Masked Singer Australia's Prawn has been at the centre of some of the most feverish guesses from fans.

And on Sunday night, the singer was finally revealed to be actor and TV host Darren McMullen, 37.

But the House Husbands star was not who most people watching at home were expecting.

Not who you thought! The Masked Singer Australia's Prawn was unmasked on Sunday night and it turns out that the popular guesses were wrong

The most popular guess was Kris Smith, who happens to be judge Dannii Minogue's ex partner.

Another common guess was Andrew Flintoff, a British TV presenter and sportsman who hosts Ninja Warrior Australia.

One shocked viewer Tweeted: 'Was convinced it was Kris Smith. Well played'.

Who? The identity of the Prawn has been at the centre of some of the most feverish guesses from fans

Look who it is! The singer was finally revealed to be actor and TV host Darren McMullen, 37

Another person chimed in: 'Not gonna lie, even though I'm disappointed in who the prawn is, his voice is good!'

Someone else Tweeted: 'Prawn is Darren McMullen... you got me there!'

Some however were confused by his identity, with one person Tweeting: 'Oh my god it's Darren McMullen. The rest of us (including Lindsay) I don't know who that is'.

Shocked: The House Husbands star was not who most people watching at home were expecting. Fans took to Twitter to express their surprise

Upon being unmasked, Darren revealed that he had never sung before and the show allowed him to achieve that dream.

He said: 'My whole life, I've wanted to sing, I've wanted to be on stage, I wanted to do that.

'And if I can do that somehow with a mask and hidden behind this prawn, that would be a great opportunity.'
description: The identity of the Masked Singer Australia's Prawn has been at the centre of some of the most feverish guesses from fans.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
